loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 45 years old and has four children. She is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Merlinda is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Merlinda requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business.

Merlinda has been raising livestock for three years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Orozkan

texts.ru: Орозкан 41 год, не замужем,детей нет. У Орозкан среднее образование, с 2000 года занимается реализацией овощей на местном рынке. Благодаря упорному труду, на сегодняшний день в товарообороте Орозкан есть овощей на сумму 165,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Орозкан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для покупки овощей, Орозкан  хочет увеличить товарооборот, что позволит улучшить уровень жизни и накопить средства на покупку квартиры.
texts.en: Orozkan is 41 years old, single, without children. She has secondary education. Since 2000 she  has been vegetables at the local market. Thanks to her hard work, today Orozkan  maintains a stock of produce for 165, 000 KGS. Her monthly income is 15,000 KGS. In order to develop her business further, Orozkan has turned to the Bai Tushum & Partners microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy vegetables .Orozkan would like to increase her sales volume, which will allow her to improve her life conditions and eventually save up enough to buy an apartment.

loans.use: to increase turnover of vegetables.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.es:
Fatima está cursando el 3° Año de la Carrera de Contaduría Pública vive con sus padres, que la ayudan para estudiar, su marido trabaja en la zona de Concepción quién también la ayuda para seguir con sus estudios.
Cuando se reciba quiere ejercer su profesión, y comenta que su aspiración es ser un gran profesional y así ser útil a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de estudios, como fotocopias, materiales de estudios y demás. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo de poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Fatima is in her third year of her degree program in Public Accounting. She lives with her parents, who have helped her with her studies. Her husband works in Concepción and has also helped her to continue her education.

When she receives her degree, Fatima wants to pursue her profession. She says that her aspiration is to become a successful professional and be useful to her family. Fatima is requesting this loan so that she can invest in her educational expenses such as photocopies, study materials, and supplies. She is grateful for the assistance she has received so that she can continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay for educational expenses such as photocopies, study materials, and supplies.

loans.name: Narishakti Shg Group

texts.en:
Janu is 32 years old and a married lady who has four children. She lives with her husband in a small village in Koraput district, Odisha, India. In the photo, the lady sitting in the middle is Janu. She has been earning a living through cultivating vegetables for eight years. The current business earns her about 3,000 INR per month to meet the family’s needs. Other members of this group are engaged in paddy cultivation, vegetable cultivation etc.

Now Janu is leading her group called "Narishakti" to ask for a loan. Janu is going to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland and to buy goats to raise. She hopes to earn more income from her current business to improve her living conditions. She is very grateful to Kiva and its lenders across the world for this kind help and support. All the members of this group are very happy with this loan, which they know can change their income level and standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farm and to buy goats to raise

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 64 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de ir a una escuela, como todo buen salvadoreño  luchador, aprendió por sus propios medios con algunos mayores con los que se reunía para que le enseñaran, está casado y tiene 4  hijos con su pareja quien es ama de casa, todos sus hijos viven aparte y en casa solo están algunos nietos.


Él es agricultor, tiene más de veinte años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño lo indujo por el buen camino, siendo responsable. La parcela donde trabaja le queda a un kilómetro de su casa, el recorrido lo hace a pie, a pesar de la edad su buen estado de salud le ha permitido seguir trabajando.  Cuando saca la cosecha una parte la vende y lo demás es para el consumo del hogar, nadie más se involucra en la actividad y el trabajo lo hace por la mañana de 6:00 am a 12:00 md.


El préstamo será invertido para pagar el arrendamiento de la tierra donde trabaja y comprar los insumos agrícolas.

Su sueño es  seguir trabajando, ya que con esto mantiene sano su cuerpo y mente y que sus nietos puedan aprender de él.
texts.en:
Antonio is 64 years old and did not have the opportunity to attend school. Like all good determined Salvadorans, he learned on his own from a few of his elders who would gather to teach him. Antonio is married and has four children. His partner is a housewife. All of his children live apart from him, so the only other people living at his home are a few grandchildren.

Antonio is a farmer who has more than 20 years of experience in this line of work. When Antonio was a child, his father led him down the right path of being responsible. The parcel of land that he works is located one kilometer from his house, so he must travel on foot. Despite his age, Antonio is in good health and is able to keep working. When it is time to harvest, he sells part of his output and keeps the rest for household consumption. No one else is involved in his business, so he must work from 6:00 A.M. to 12:00 P.M.

His loan will be invested in the rent payment of the land on which he works. He will also buy farming supplies. Antonio’s dream is to continue working, so he maintains a healthy body and mind so that his grandchildren can learn from him.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and to pay the rent on his farmland.

loans.name: Dalmi

texts.es:
Dalmi es de la ciudad de Pilar, es una mujer muy trabajadora, que es maestra, y cuenta que tiene 16 años de labor en una Universidad.
Dalmi está estudiando el Doctorado en Educación Superior, y quiere en un futuro tener una empresa propia y ejercer su profesión, así llevar adelante a su familia.
Ella está pidiendo este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la cuota de su universidad, lo que le será de mucha ayuda y que le permitirá seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Dalmi is from the city of Pilar. She is a hardworking woman who is a teacher by profession. Dalmi has been working at a university for 16 years.

She is studying for a Doctorate in Higher Education. In the future, she wants to have her own company where she can exercise her profession and help her family move forward. Dalmi is requesting a loan so that she can invest in her university fees. This will be of great help since she will be able to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Zainabu

texts.en: Zainabu is a 43-year-old married woman with four children and six dependents, living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. After the previous loan, she managed to send her children to school and improved her cocoa-selling business. She is able to sell to cocoa agents and dreams of strengthening the welfare of her family, although sickness and competition hinder her plans. Zainabu wants another loan to buy cocoa for selling.

loans.use: to buy cocoa for selling,

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to convert her vehicle to natural gas.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Señorita Maria vive con su madre y sus hermanas, trabaja como cajera en un banco hace 2 años, es soltera, y estudia la carrera de contabilidad, estando en el 3to año.
Su sueño es poder terminar su carrera exitosamente ya que le permitirá poder ascender en su trabajo, a la vez que podrá ayudar un poco más a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando y luchando por cumplir su meta.
texts.en:
Srta. Maria lives with her mother and sisters. She has been working as a cashier at a bank for two years. Maria is single and is studying for a degree in Accounting. She is in her third year of study.

Her dream is to finish her degree successfully so that she can be promoted in her job. At the same time, she will be able to provide a little more help for her family. Maria is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the payment of her university fees. This will enable her to continue studying and striving toward the completion of her goal.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Reina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Reina, tiene mayor demanda de los productos que tiene a la venta en la tienda y no es suficiente el inventario con que cuenta, por lo que se decidió a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar pan, galletas, gaseosas, jugos, arroz, frijoles, maíz, azúcar, huevos, etc.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció su negocio, atrajo nuevos clientes, mejoro el servicio del molino nixtamal, su familia está gozando de mejores condiciones de vida y ha logrado pagar su deuda.
texts.en:
Reina has greater demand for the products that she sells in her store, but her current inventory is insufficient. For this reason, she decided to request a new loan in order to buy bread, cookies, sodas, juices, rice, beans, corn, sugar, eggs, and other products.

With her previous loan, Reina was able to strengthen her business and attract new customers by improving her milling service (grinding corn into cornmeal). Her family enjoys better living conditions and she was able to repay her debt.

loans.use: to buy bread, cookies, sodas, juices, rice, beans, corn, sugar, eggs, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, cucumbers and cooking seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: Gilma Elizabeth

texts.es: Gilma tiene 37 años de edad y posee una pequeña tienda desde hace tres años en la cual distribuye variedad de productos de primera necesidad. Además, vende comida y tortillas. Ella es una mujer emprendedora y visionaria quien desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, grava y pago de mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en:
Gilma is 37 years old. For the past three years, she has managed a small store where she distributes a variety of basic staple products. In addition, she sells food and tortillas.

Gilma is an enterprising and visionary woman who wants to improve her living conditions. For this reason, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the construction of a room. She needs materials such as bricks, cement, sand, iron, and gravel. Gilma will also pay for the construction labor.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and pay for labor in order to build a room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a solar system for his home

loans.name: Eswari Shg Group

texts.en:
Kalaiselvi is the leader of Eswari Self Help Group, which is shaped by the NGO People Action for the Transformation (PAT) in Tamil Nadu, India. 

Kalaiselvi is 26 years old and lives in her own house with two children and her husband, Chinnappan, in Nagamangalam village. Her husband works in an office. Kalaiselvi has previously taken loans from PAT for the betterment of her livelihood and each time she repaid the loan on time.
 
Kalaiselvi wants to buy a smokeless stove manufactured by Greenway Grameen Infra Pvt. Ltd. These stoves are better than traditional stoves, as they cook faster and emit less smoke. The traditional stove emits a lot of smoke containing carbon dioxide, which affects both her and the children’s health with diseases like tract infection, lung diseases, and asthma. The smokeless stove is light in weight, produces less smoke and uses 65% less fuel than traditional stoves.

Kalaiselvi, along with the other members, is requesting a loan to buy a smokeless stove. They all hope to have a healthier life with this stove.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Maya

texts.en:
Maya, in her 40s, is married and the mother of two children (one son and one daughter).  She is from Dhupguri. She has an elementary education, but her parents' poor financial resources could not afford her any higher studies.  She is married to Dulal, age 50, who is a farmer by profession.  Their children are attending school and are in grade 12 and grade 9.  They live in the village of Magurmari in Jalpaiguri district.  Their house is in one of the most remote areas in the region, lacks basic amenities like electricity and municipal water supply, and it is a kachha house (made of straw, mud and bamboo).

Maya is a complete homemaker and her husband works on his farmland to bear the expenses of his family.  He mainly grows paddy rice.  The village has good agricultural land and access to ponds and rivers, making paddy cultivation possible. Thus, most of the farmers of this village are engaged in cultivating paddy.  In addition, as it is the staple food for the villagers of the region as well as for the people of West Bengal, the product has a good demand and is profitable too. Maya also helps her husband in his work while managing her household works.

Maya is very energetic, enthusiastic and determined to make her future through hard work and cooperation.  She has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to cultivate more paddies in their farmland.  She wants to use the loan to purchase seeds, manure and other things.  She hopes the loan will help her to raise her standard of living and to provide a higher education to her children.

She is thankful to the generous investors (BJS and Kiva) who stand for her cause.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies (high yield paddy seeds, fertilizer and manure) for cultivation of paddy.

loans.name: Madres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Madres Emprendedoras, es un grupo formado en la ciudad de San Ignacio, son madres que luchan por sus hijos, para poder darles todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener, y de esa forma evitar que pasen por necesidades como las que ellas tuvieron que pasar. 
La Sra. María es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella se dedica a la lavandería, es muy trabajadora y luchadora, a través de su esfuerzo y su sacrificio está sacando adelante a su familia. Comenta que se ha hecho de muy buena clientela y que de esa forma tiene los ingresos necesarios para el día a día.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de jabón para lavar, enjuague para ropa, suavizante y demás insumos, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
“Madres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Mothers) is a group that was formed in the city of San Ignacio. The members are mothers who strive on behalf of their children so that they can give them everything that they did not have. They want their families to avoid the experiences that they had to endure.

Sra. María is one of the members of this group. She provides laundry services. María is a hardworking and determined individual. Through her efforts and sacrifice, she has been able to move her family forward. She has a very good clientele, which is how she earns income for daily needs.

María is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of laundry soap, laundry rinse, fabric softener, and other supplies. This will enable her to continue her work just as before.

loans.use: to buy laundry soap, laundry rinse, fabric softener, and other supplies.

loans.name: Thelma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Thelma, requiere más capital para comprar ganado de repasto, de esta manera seguirá invirtiendo en su negocio y mejorando sus ingresos, los cuales serán de ayuda para cubrir las necesidades de su familia y cancelar la nueva deuda.
El financiamiento anterior le ayudo a incrementar el ganado, las circunstancias familiares se mantienen, su situación económica ha cambiado positivamente y ha mantenido su buen record crediticio.
texts.en:
Thelma is requesting more capital in order to buy cattle for grazing. This would allow her to continue investing in her business so that she can improve her income. As a result, she would be able to cover her family’s needs and repay the new debt.

The previous loan helped to increase her herd of cattle. Her family’s circumstances have remained steady, but her financial situation has undergone positive change. In addition, she has maintained a good credit record.

loans.use: to buy cattle for grazing.

loans.name: Jyotsna

texts.en:
Jyotsna is from Dhupguri.  She is a rural housewife and a mother of three grown-up sons.  She is 54 years old and an illiterate woman who can only sign her name. She lives in their own kachha house (made of straw, mud and bamboo) in a small village in Jalpaiguri. She attended school up to grade three and could not study further due to the poor economic resources of her parents. Now she is a housewife.  Her husband Prafulla, 60 years old, attended school until the third grade of primary school and is a farmer by profession.  Jyotsna's sons were deprived of an education due to poverty.  They are now working as masons.

Jyotsna's husband currently grows rice.  Jyotsna and her husband have been involved in this activity for 15 years. They have good knowledge of paddy rice cultivation. But the income is insufficient.  Jyotsna's sons have no consistent income. So, Jyotsna plans to improve her business by growing more paddy rice. She wants to boost her agricultural business and to do so, she wants to take a loan.

She applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to purchase agricultural inputs such as seeds, manure and other things. With this loan, she hopes she will grow better quality paddy and sell it in the market.  She dreams of giving a decent lifestyle to her family and construct a better and decent house (made of concrete and mortar).

Her earnest and heartiest thanks go to Kiva and BJS.

loans.use: To purchase paddy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Kalpana

texts.en:
Kalpana is a young entrepreneur from Dhupguri.  She is 24, active, energetic and optimistic.  She is married to Paritosh, 34 years old. She has an elementary education.  Her husband passed 10th standard.  They live in their own house in the village of Kalirhat in Jalpaiguri district.

Kalpana's husband is a worker at a printing press.  But his earnings are far from adequate to meet only the food expenses for the family. So, to strengthen the family economy, Kalpana has been successfully operating a grocery shop where she sells tealeaves, rice, cooking oil, biscuits, flour and other snacks.  She runs the shop from her house.  So, for the last few years, she has been a good financial support to the family.  In order to cope with the continuing price increases of the essential commodities, she intends to expand her business.

So she asked for a loan from BJS to make bulk purchases of the groceries at a lower cost from wholesalers so that she can receive higher sales. She hopes to earn good revenue with the loan, which will help her in achieving her target to better provide for her family and make her shop bigger with more grocery items.

She thanks her lenders (BJS and Kiva) for their support.

loans.use: To purchase grocery stock in bulk for her shop.

loans.name: Jovenes Luchadores Group

texts.es:
El grupo conformado por 9 jóvenes está en su ciclo número 1º, donde todos tienen iniciativas de trabajar y se ayudan por salir adelante, además por medio de su trabajo quieren poder ser de ayuda en sus casas. Tienen deseos de trabajar en equipo con el fundamento de lograr ayudarse con responsabilidad para mejorar el nivel de vida de cada uno de ellos
Cecilia es la presidenta de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de lencerías, tiene todo tipo y es lo que más gusta a sus clientes, ya que así los atrae por medio de la variedad que tiene. Cecilia es una joven que quiere ser alguien en la vida, y es por ello que está luchando.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar más tipo de lencerías, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus ventas, luchando por poder crecer y salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
This group consists of nine young people who are in their first loan cycle. All of them have started to work so that they can move forward. In addition, their work will enable them to be of help in their respective homes. These young people have the desire to work as a team since one of the fundamentals is to help each other become responsible so that they can improve their standard of living.

Cecilia is the president of this group. She sells lingerie of all types, which is what her customers like most. Cecilia has been able to attract customers with the variety she offers. She is a young person who wants to become somebody in life, which is why she keeps striving.

Cecilia is requesting a loan in order to buy more types of lingerie. This will enable her to continue making sales. She strives to grow and move forward so that she can become somebody in life.

loans.use: to buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Kamatchi Shg Group

texts.en:
Gokila, 35 years old, is the leader of Kamatchi Self Help Group, which was formed by the NGO People Action for Transformation (PAT) in Tamil Nadu, India. Gokila lives in her own house in Thiruneelakudi village with her child and her husband, Marriappan. He is a small marginal farmer. Gokila has taken loans from PAT previously to improve her livelihood and repaid them on time.

The fire from a traditional stove creates tangible and adverse effects including stinging eye, scratchy throats, coughs, and dirty, soot-covered walls. The smokeless stove is the solution to all of these problems, as it cooks faster and emits much less smoke. Gokila, along with the other members, is requesting a loan to buy a smokeless stove. They hope to save time as well as money and to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Maya

texts.en:
Maya is a young woman of only 29 years.  She hails from the village of Magurmari in Jalpaiguri district.  She is married to Amulya, 48 years old.  They are raising two children (one son and one daughter), who are in different grades in primary school. Maya received a primary education but her husband is illiterate and can only sign his name. They have a small kachha house (made of mud, wood and straw).

Maya's husband is a cycle-van puller.  It is a mode of transport that is widely used in rural areas of West Bengal to carry loads and people. He has endured many a hardship, since his family is poor.  He has had to do many odd jobs to save money to buy a cycle-van, which he used to provide transportation services to the people of the town and thus support his household. But recently, his cycle-van met with an accident and was damaged severely.  So, it has become impossible for him to cover the needs of his family.  His economic opportunities can be much improved by a loan that will enable him to purchase a new van.

So to help her husband, Maya has asked for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy a cycle-van for her husband, in order to improve her husband's business and provide a better service to his customers. She hopes it will help them to get over the financial hurdles that they are facing at present and save money for the future to construct a concrete-made house for them.

She gives her thanks to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a cycle-van for her husband

loans.name: Sembaruthi Shg Group

texts.en:
PAT actively engages the members of SHGs in savings and internal credit as well as in other activities like income generation, natural resources management, literacy, childcare, nutrition, etc. This way, it provides a chance for women to have control over capital, although it is small in size. Every month SHG meetings are conducted to discuss various local and women related issues.
 
“Sembaruthi” Self Help Group consists of five members from the Keelarasur village of Tamil Nadu. Amutha is the featured borrower. She is 35 years old and married to Mr. Jayaraj, a farmer by profession. They live in their own house with their two kids. 

Amutha, along with her group members, is requesting a loan to buy a smokeless stove. These women use mud stoves. A mud stove takes a lot of time to cook, it emits a lot of smoke, which is injurious to health, and in the long run, can lead to lung diseases, whereas smokeless stoves lower fuel wood consumption, require less need to cut trees for firewood and reduce carbon emissions and indoor air pollution levels.  With this loan, the women hope to live a healthier life.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, está casado, tiene la edad de 63 años y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de sus siembras de frijol y maíz, el se dedica desde hace varios años atrás a estos cultivos y espera este año sea favorable para él. Él espera con esta mejora aumentar las cosechas y tener un mejor rendimiento. Tiene como meta generar ingresos para el bienestar de su hogar. Es el tercer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gerardo is 63 years old and married. He lives with his wife who is his highest priority. Gerardo intends to use this loan to buy supplies for maintaining his bean and corn crops. He has been farming for several years and hopes that this year will be favorable to him. Gerardo hopes that an improvement will increase his harvest so that he can have a larger output. His goal is to generate income for the welfare of his household.

This is the third loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Gerardo has not had any other loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is offering this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for his corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy computer equipment.

loans.name: Oscar Cayetano

texts.es:
Oscar, sigue mejorando su negocio con ayuda de créditos, en esta oportunidad el capital que requiere lo utilizara para comprar abono, semilla, fertilizantes, plaguicidas e insecticidas; así dará un buen trato al terreno en el que cultivara maíz y yuca.
El préstamo anterior lo invirtió en la compra de insumos agrícolas con los que pudo dar un buen desarrollo a sus cultivos, su producción es mayor, abasteció a sus clientes teniendo mayores ventas y mejores ingresos. Su familia está viviendo mejor circunstancia.
texts.en:
Oscar continues to improve his business with the help of the loans. He is taking this opportunity to request capital so that he can buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, fungicides, and insecticides. This will allow him to do a good job of maintaining the land for cultivating corn and cassava.

His previous loan was invested in the purchase of farming supplies, which allowed his crops to become well-developed. His production increased and his ability to supply his customers resulted in higher sales and more income. Oscar’s family is living under better circumstances.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, fungicides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Penina

texts.en: Thirty-five-year-old Penina lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She is married with six children, five of whom go to school. For 15 years, she has practiced cocoa farming to sell and has seen her family have a good standard of living. From the small savings of her cocoa plantation, she managed to start selling fish to add to her income collection, although insufficient funds affect her. She is requesting a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her children

loans.name: Santos Asuncion

texts.es: Santos de 59 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia, tiene mucha experiencia en el cultivo de maíz y maicillo ha tenido ya varios años de estar cultivando, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en graneros así como muestra en la fotografía, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir  algunas necesidades de su hogar, Don Santos solicita un crédito  para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Santos, 59, lives with his wife and children in their own home.  He has a lot of experience growing corn and sorghum.  He has been growing these for several years now.  When his harvest is ready, he stores it in barn like that in the photograph.  He uses the income he generates to take care of household expenses.  

He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, insecticides, herbicides, etc.  This will help him to continue providing his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, insecticides, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Santos Elizabeth

texts.es: Doña Santos de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 20 años, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa y por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, Doña Santos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor como:  sopas, frijoles, azúcar, golosinas, refrescos, etc. y asi poder seguir con sus ventas y tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos, 37, lives in her own house with her husband and two children.  She has a small store located in her home which she has been running for twenty years.  She has a lot of customers thanks to the variety of products she has on offer and the reasonable prices.  

With the money she makes from the sales and what her husband earns, they take care of the household expenses.  

Santos is asking for a loan to buy more goods wholesale, such as: soup, frijoles beans, sugar, sweets, soft drinks, etc.  This will allow her to continue with her sales and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soups, frijoles beans, sugar, sweets, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
Tomasa tiene 44 años de edad, es una persona con muy buenos principios y valores morales, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en la comunidad en donde ella vive, ya que en esa zona no hay mucha competencia de ventas, esto le permite salir adelante con su familia, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, y solo tienen un hijo.

Tomasa tiene experiencia en este negocio desde de su juventud, cuando sus padres se encontraron en problemas y no veían la salida a los problemas económicos, entonces Tomasa decidió emprender el negocio para ayudarles a salir adelante.


El préstamo lo necesita para comprar frutas y verduras, esto permitirá engrandecer sus ventas y por consiguiente obtener mejores ingresos

Tomasa planea a futuro engrandecer mas su negocio, ella piensa que a futuro tendrá una tienda donde se puedan vender frutas y verduras frescas.
texts.en:
Tomasa, 44, is a woman of strong principles and values.  She sells fruit and vegetables in local community.  In this area where she lives, there is not a lot of competition, so she is able to generate an income which helps her take care of her family.  She is married and her husband works in agriculture.  They have one son only.

She has built up experience in this line of work since she was young.  She started to help her parents at a time of financial difficulty for them.  She set up her own business to help them get along. 

She needs this loan to buy fruit and vegetables.  This will allow her to increase her sales and as a result, generate more income. 

She hopes to expand her business in the future, owning her own store where she can sell her fresh produce.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Kayi Nathalie

texts.fr:
Kayi a 42 ans.  Pour pouvoir constituer un fonds de roulement pour sa boutique d’alimentation générale, Kayi a débuté en 2005 la vente ambulante des produits de beauté dans son quartier et dans les environnants. Avec l’équipe Assilassimé qui la suit dans ses activités par ses formations, elle a ouvert sa boutique à domicile. 
Très dévouée à élargir son commerce, elle y consacre plus de 12h de temps par jour. Par ce prêt, elle souhaite acquérir des sacs de riz, des bidons d’huile pour augmenter son chiffre d’affaire.
texts.en:
Kayi is 42 years old.  In order to gather enough working capital and open her own grocery store, she started in 2005 as an itinerant seller of beauty products and she sold her goods in and around her neighborhood.   With the help of the Assilassimé team, which offers training and supports her in her commercial activities, Kayi has been able to open her own store, at home.

Kayi is very eager to expand her store's inventory and she works in it more than 12 hours per day.  She plans to use this loan to buy some bags of rice as well as some cans of oil, which will help her to increase her turnover.

loans.use: to buy five bags of rice and four cans of oil.

loans.name: Noelie

texts.fr: Noélie a 29 ans. Elle demeure dans une chambre louée avec son enfant dans le quartier d'Adidogomé. Noélie est coiffeuse et associe à sa profession la vente des mèches et tissages. Pour satisfaire les demandes de ses clients et amoindrir les coûts, elle souhaite élargir son stock par l’achat 04 douzaines de tissage, 03 douzaines de mèches et 10 douzaines de crème.
texts.en: Noélie is 29 years old.  She lives in a rented room with her child, in the Adidogomé neighborhood.  She is a hairdresser and also sells hair weaves and hair extensions.  In order to meet her customers' demand, and also to reduce her costs, she would like to expand her stock of merchandise through the purchase of four dozen hair weaves, three dozen hair extensions and 10 dozen bottles of anti-frizz lotion.

loans.use: to buy four dozen hair-weaves, three dozen hair extensions, and 10 dozen anti-frizz lotions

loans.name: Omar Antonio

texts.es:
Omar, es soltero, tiene 35 años de edad, tiene bajo su cuidado un hijo de 15 años de edad quien está estudiando; para lograr tener recursos económicos con los que puede salir adelante con su hijo se dedica a realizar estructuras metálicas desde hace ya 5 años, trabaja todos los días, sus conocimientos los adquirió siendo empleado. En este momento no representa ningún problema.
Solicita capital para comprarse hiero, pintura, electrodos, láminas, tubos, etc., con lo que incrementara su inventario, elaborar sus trabajos con mayor calidad y tener nuevos ingresos para cumplir con sus compromisos económicos.
Su aspiración es tener una mejor situación económica para brindar un mejor estilo de vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Omar, 35, is single.  He has a 15-year-old son who he takes care of.  His son is studying at the moment.  

To generate an income to be able to get along in life and provide for his son, Omar dedicates his time to metal work; a profession he has had for five years.  He works every day and learnt his skills on the job. For the moment, there are no problems.

He is asking for a loan to buy iron, paint, electrodes, corrugated sheets, pipes, etc.  This will increase his inventory and allow him to carry out his work with more quality.  This will help him to generate an income to take care of his financial commitments.

His aim is to improve his financial situation so that he can provide his son with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy iron, paint, electrodes, corrugated sheets, pipes, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de  27 años de edad, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz yfrijol, adicional a eso también tiene un molino ubicado en su lugar de residencia, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia con lo que obtiene de sus ventas  logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL  para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos etc. y mejorar el terreno donde desea hacer sus cultivos para obtener mejores ingresos y tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
This client of 27 years of age grows basic grains such as corn and frijoles beans.  She also has a mill in her house.  She sells her products at the different local markets near her home.  She uses the money she makes to take care of some household expenses.  

She lives in her own house with her family. 

She is asking for a loan from 'Integral' to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, etc.  This will improve the land where she wants to grow her crops and will in turn, help her to make more profit.  As a result, she will be able to enjoy a better quality of life with her family, without having the need of anything.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, etc.  and to improve the land.

loans.name: Wendy Lissette

texts.es:
Wendy, tiene la necesidad de invertir más en su negocio y como obtiene  buenos resultados al invertir créditos, se decidió por solicitar más capital que utilizara para comprar cerdos, concentrados y vitaminas, con lo que mejorara la alimentación y condiciones de sus animales, espera recuperar lo invertido con mejores ganancias.
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo el alimento necesario para el cuidado de los cerdos, lo que le facilito la comercialización de estos en el mercado y sus ganancias le han ayudado a mejorar las circunstancias familiares y a cancelar su deuda.
texts.en:
Wendy needs to invest again in her business and as she has been successful with loans in the past, she has decided to ask for another one.  She will use this one to buy pigs, animal feed and vitamins.  This will improve their diet and the conditions her animals live in.  She hopes to recover her investment through the profits she makes. 

With the last loan, she bought the food she needed to look after her pigs.  She was then able to sell them on the market.  Her income has helped her to improve family life and pay off the debt.
.

loans.use: to buy pigs, animal feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Wernedes Adan

texts.es:
Wernedes, mantiene funcionando su negocio de carpintería y venta de artículos para el hogar, puesto que con el crédito anterior pudo surtir el inventario de ambas actividades, actualmente tiene más clientes y el estilo de vida ha mejorado.
Nuevamente solicita capital para comprar madera, barniz, clavos, bisagras y lijas, así equipara la carpintería para seguir progresando.
texts.en:
Wernedes, who has a carpentry business and sells household articles, has kept his business running thanks to the previous loan.  He was able to supply both his businesses.  He now has more customers and his quality of life has improved.

He is asking for a loan again so that he can buy wood, varnish, nails, hinges and files.  This will equip his carpentry business with all he needs to keep progressing.

loans.use: to buy wood, varnish, nails, hinges and files.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
Roberto tiene 40 años de edad, es una persona que se ocupa en la  venta de productos lácteos para poder darle una buena alimentación  a su familia. Está acompañado y en casa viven tres hijos, todos ellos estudiantes.


Roberto aprendió el comercio de lácteos con su padre, cuando él era un chico su padre lo instruyó sobre como generar ganancias en la venta de lácteos, ya tiene mucha experiencia en la compra y venta de todo tipo de queso.


El préstamo será utilizado para comprar queso, esto permitirá comprar cierta cantidad de queso para luego comercializarlos es el mercado de quesos y productos lácteos, esto ayudará a obtener muy buenos ingresos para mantener a su familia.


Roberto planea a futuro comercializar con una mayor cantidad de productos lácteos.
texts.en:
Roberto, 40, sells dairy products so that he can provide his family with food to eat.   He is married and lives together with his three children, who are all studying.

He learnt the trade of dairy products from his father.  When he was young his father taught him how to generate an income from the sale of these products.  Nowadays, he has a lot of experience in buying and selling all types of cheese

He is asking for a loan to buy cheese.  He wants a certain amount which he can then sell on the cheese and dairy market.  As a result, he will earn a good profit that he can invest in his family.

In the future, he would like to sell a wider range of dairy products.

loans.use: to buy cheese which he will sell.

loans.name: Rafael De Jesus

texts.es: Don Rafael  tiene 54 años  de edad  es de la comunidad de aguas  calientes  estudio en la escuela de la comunidad  es decir aprendió lo básico como es leer y escribir, después para apoyar a su padre  en los trabajos de agricultura  con su padre dice que aprendió a trabajar fuerte y a defenderse en la vida , a los 18 años se casó  de este matrimonio procreo 4 hijos   ya hoy en día sus hijos están mayores y con su vida realizada hasta nietos le han dado , el se dedica a cultivar la tierra de esta manera recibe ingresos  para los gastos de la casa, en la comunidad no tienen electricidad el desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia es por eso que quiere hacer tramite de este crédito para así instalarlo en su vivienda
texts.en:
Rafael, 54, lives in the community of Aguas Calientes.  He studied the basics like reading and writing in the local school.  Afterwards, he started to help his father with agricultural work, learning from him how to work hard and look after your family.  

Rafael got married when he was 18 and has four children from this marriage.  Now his children are grown up and some have even given him grandchildren.  

He prepares the land so that he can generate an income to pay for household expenses.  

His community does not have electricity, so he would like to improve his family's standard of living by asking for a loan to be able to install it in his home.

loans.use: to install a solar system in his home.

loans.name: Erinest

texts.en: For six years, Erinest has dealt in selling cocoa to earn a living. The 29-year-old married man with one child lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He wishes to go back to school and complete his studies. Although very hard working, the high competition in the market affects his plans in spite of having managed to continue selling cocoa. As a loving father, Erinest is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his child.

loans.use: To pay school fees for his child

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers, body cream and toothpaste to expand her business.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a 53-year-old male, who is married with eight children. Seven of the children attend school. They are living in Kasese, Uganda. 

Paul practices agriculture, and he has a banana and sugar cane plantation. He also deals in g nuts and coffee selling for additional income. He has been in that business since 1998, with an aim of getting a daily source of income to support his family. Paul needs a loan to pay for labor and to buy pesticides.

loans.use: to pay for labor and to buy pesticides.

loans.name: Vilma Esperanza

texts.es: Vilma de 47 años de edad se dedica  a la pesca artesanal desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus venta logra sostener a su familia económicamente, Vilma vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de redes y trasmayos para continuar con la pesca y así poder tener mejores ingresos y darle a su familia  una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Vilma, 47, has been working in artisan fishing for several years and is able to earn enough to support her family economically.  She lives in her own house with her family.  The loan she is requesting is buy fishing and trammel nets to continue her fishing activity and earn more income to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fishing and trammel nets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to register her car in order to drive it legally and finish her work easily from one customer to another

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more green vegetables to expand her business.

loans.name: Duncan

texts.en:
Duncan is a husband and father to two young sons who are both in primary school. He lives in a small shared rental house. His greatest monthly expenses are his children's school fees and rent.

Duncan operates a small electrical shop that sells improved cooking stoves and chairs an environmental conservation group on renewable energy and environmental conservation practices. Duncan resides in a small town that borders Lake Naivasha, where deforestation and pollution are destroying the precious ecology of his home. He champions the environmental program through selling improved stoves that are efficient and use 60% less fuel, therefore reducing number of trees cut for charcoal and offsetting carbon emissions.

His greatest challenge is inadequate funds to purchase the cookstoves at a wholesale price. Many of his customers require payment plans, which stretches the working capital of his business.

He is requesting for a loan to buy more improved stoves for resale to his community with an aim of conserving the environment and creating awareness on the importance of environmental conservation.

His hopes and dreams are to be a major distributor of improved cooking stoves and empower his community with skills for environmental conservation.

loans.use: To buy improved cookstoves to sell to his community

loans.name: Reina Elizabeth

texts.es:
Reina tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y su esposo es comerciante de frutas y verduras.

Ella trabaja en una óptica (venta de todo tipo de lentes), para llegar al trabajo se va en microbus, tiene experiencia desde cuando tenia 25 años de edad, todo comienza cuando ella conoció a  un Dr muy reconocido de la ciudad quien le comunicó acerca de la plaza vacante y así es como desempeña este trabajo hoy en día.


El préstamo será utilizado para cancelar deudas  y comprar artículos para el hogar.


Reina planea a futuro solventar todas sus deudas y ayudarle  a su esposo en la comercialización de verdura.
texts.en:
Reina, 35, is married and her husband sells fruits and vegetables.  She works at an optometrist's shop (selling all kinds of glasses), and travels by microbus to get to work.  She has been working since she was 25.  It all began when she met a well-known doctor in the city who told her about the vacant job.  So she has been working there every since.

The loan will be used to pay off debt and buy home products.  Reina plans to pay back debt and help her husband in his vegetable business.

loans.use: To pay off debt and buy home products.

loans.name: Silvia Marixa

texts.es: Silvia  de 39 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con eso ella logra solventar algunas necesidades de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, Silvia esta solicitando   un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor como: camisas, pantalones, blusas, faldas, shorts,  etc. y asi poder tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Silvia, 39, works as a street vendor selling clothing in different communities near her home.  She is able to earn enough to cover part of the household expenses.  She lives with her family in her own home.

The loan Silvia is requesting is to buy wholesale clothing such as shirts, pants, blouses, skirts, shorts, etc. so she and her family can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale clothing such as shirts, pants, blouses, skirts, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Emilse Maritzel

texts.es: Emilse  es una joven entusiasta y luchadora de la comunidad de telica, ella es la menor de sus hermanos, comenta que desde muy temprana edad su madre le enseño a trabajar y a ser bien dinámica e independiente con el apoyo de sus padres y hermanos ella estudio y logro terminar toda su secundaria  y sacar un técnico en enfermería ,  también  cultiva granos básicos y los vende en las temporadas de cosecha , su familia tiene unas cabezas de ganado y eso también es un ingreso que reciben ya que venden la leche o la cuajada, en la comunidad como en otras comunidades aledañas no tienen energía eléctrica y estar a oscuras es triste  es por esa razón que ella quiere realizar tramite de crédito para comprar un sistema solar e instalarlo en la vivienda.
texts.en:
Emilse is an enthusiastic, hard-working young woman who lives in a community called Telica.  She is the youngest of her siblings and says she learned to work hard and be dynamic and independent from her mother.  With the support of her parents and siblings she finished high school and also got a nursing technician cerfiticate.  

She grows basic grains which she sells at harvest time.  Her family has several head of cattle and also earns income from selling milk and custard.  In her community, as well as in neighboring communities, there is no electric energy which means there is not much light.  Therefore, Emilse wants to use the loan to buy a solar energy system for her house.

loans.use: To buy a solar energy system.

loans.name: Swaa Mawupenusin Group

texts.fr:
Depuis 2004, Angèle s’approvisionne au grand marché en pagne et les revends dans les quartiers Novissi et Kodomé à Lomé. Elle habite Kodomé avec son mari et ses 2 enfants, Angèle s’approvisionne deux fois par mois et vend de lundi à samedi,  de 8h à 18h. Elle est leader du groupe SWAA MAWUPENUSIN et a le sens de rigueur et une capacité d’écoute. Ses capacités lui permettent de fidéliser ses clients et d’avoir des recettes importantes par jour. 
Apres avoir suivi la formation sur la diversification de ses produits, Angèle veut ajouter à son stock 9 pièces de pagne avec le crédit qu'elle sollicite.
Les autres membres du groupe commercialisent divers produits tels que, le maïs, les mèches, les produits de premières nécessités, les fruits  et autres. Leur désir est de renforcer leur stock par l’achat de produits supplémentaires.
texts.en:
Since 2004 Angèle has been getting supplies of "pagne" (brightly colored fabric) from the Grand Market and reselling them in the Novissi and Kodomé districts of Lomé. She lives in Kodomé with her husband and two children. She gets fresh supplies twice a month and sells from Monday to Saturday, from eight o'clock in the morning to six in the evening. She is the leader of the Swaa Mawupenusin group and is self-disciplined with a capacity for listening. Her capabilities have allowed her to build up a loyal customer base and make a significant daily income.

Having developed some diversification of her products, Angèle would now like to add nine pieces of "pagne" fabric to her stock with the loan she is requesting. The other members of the group sell a variety of products such as corn, hair extensions, basic commodities, fruits and others. Their aim is to build up their stock by buying further products.

loans.use: to buy nine pieces of "pagne" fabric.

loans.name: Paula Mercedes

texts.es:
Paula de 64 años de edad, es una señora que no tubo la oportunidad de ir a la escuela, hace 26 años se caso tiene 4 hijos de las edades de 42, 41, 39, 27; su esposo se dedica a la agricultura todos sus hijos estan acompañados y cada quien tiene sus hogares aparte, ella solo vive con su esposo y una nieta, que ellos mantienen, ella va al instituto ya que esta haciendo tercer año de bachillerato. 

Paula se dedica a cuidar la casa y a tambien a sembrar pipianes, guisquiles, ejotes y cuando esta la cosecha sale a vender, ya tiene 4 años de estar haciendo esto, viendo la necesidad que hay en la casa de ella, ya que lo poco que gana su esposo no les alcanza para mantener a la familia y sobre todo porque la nieta va todos los dias al pueblo a estudiar y tiene que llevar dinero para transportarse. 

Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura ellos alquilan el terreno para sembrar, este año sembraran 7,000 metros cuadrdaos de tierra. Para trasladarse lo hacen en bus ya que les queda a una hora de su casa si lo hacen caminando pero en bus a unos 25 minutos. Trabajan de 6 de mañana a 5 de la tarde pero en la mediodia descanzan y inician tipo 3 de la tarde la otra jornada.

Con este prestamo una parte sera invertido en 2 sacos de abono y 2 litros de veneno, lo restante lo van a utilizar para consolidar una deuda que tienen con credicampo, ya que el año pasado perdieron la mayor parte de cosecha y no pudieron terminar de cancelar el crédito y con esto lo terminara de cancelar.

Los sueños que tiene es poder crecer siempre con los cultivos y con eso tener mejores ingresos, con lo que podrá cubrir sus necesidades y las de su familia. Las ganancias serán invertidas en el pago de la cuota y en los gastos que tendra la nieta cuando se gradue de bachillerato.
texts.en:
Paula is 64 years old and did not have the opportunity to go to school. Paula married 26 years ago and has four children, aged 42, 41, 39 and 27 years old respectively. Paula's husband works in farming. Their children are married and have their own homes. Paula lives with just her husband and one granddaughter whom the couple supports. The granddaughter goes to high school; she is in third year.

Paula looks after the house and also grows chillis, string beans and other items. Once harvested she goes out to sell these items. Paula has been doing this work for four years, having started after seeing a need for an income in her household. Her husband does not earn much and not enough to support the family, especially the couple's young granddaughter. Their granddaughter goes to the local town to go to school every day and has to take money to pay transportation costs.

Paula's husband works in farming. He rents land to grow crops. This year the couple will sow crops on 7000 square metres of land. The couple arrives at the land on bus as it is one hour from their house on foot, but only 25 minutes by bus. Paula and her husband work from 6am until 5pm, though stop to rest from noon until 3pm.

Part of this loan will be used to invest in two bags of manure and two litres of poison. The rest will be used to consolidate a debt that Paula owes to "CrediCampo". Last year Paula and her husband lost a large part of their harvest and could not pay off their debt; with this loan they will be able to finish paying it off.

Paula's dream is to be able to expand her crops and earn a higher income. With it she would like to be able to pay for her and her family's necessities. Profits from crops will be invested in paying off her loan, and in covering her granddaughter's expenses when she graduates from high school.

loans.use: to buy two bags of manure and two litres of poison; the rest of the loan will be used to consolidate a debt owed to CrediCampo".

loans.name: Dulalibala

texts.en:
Dulalibala is a 41-year-old married woman from Maynaguri.  She lives with her husband Binay and their two sons in the village of Khagrabari in Jalpaiguri district.  Her husband Binay, who is 46 years old, is a mason by profession. Both are illiterate and are only able to sign their names.  Their sons are attending school and are in grade 11 and grade 7.

Dulalibala's husband is a mason and has no consistent income.  His meagre income does not provide the family with sufficient food or health and he is unable to bear the expenses of her sons's education. So to help her husband to run the family well, Dulalibala has been running a business selling milk.  She has one cow, one buffalo and two goats in her herd, which she uses for selling milk to the people of her locality. She also sells milk products like butter and paneer (cottage cheese) to generate an extra amount of profit.  She has become famous for providing good-quality milk and thus contributes to her family's income.

Now she has applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to purchase another cow.  She is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

She aspires to give a higher education to her sons with the profit generated and she conveys her thanks to BJS and Kiva for their financial support.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia de 40 años de edad, ahora está soltera ya que su esposo emigró a otro país y la abandonó, vive con sus dos hijas de las cuales una está casada y la otra estudia en la escuela.

Ella es vendedora de productos de cosmetología, y además hace ventas de comida los fines de semana, decidió dedicarse a esto desde que su esposo la abandonó y una vecina le aconsejó que realiza dichas actividades para sacar adelante a sus hijas.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar productos de belleza y estilismo, esto le permitirá a ella obtener mejores ingresos para darle la educación de  su hija y el sostener a su familia. 


Virginia piensa continuar vendiendo productos de estilismo pero ademas implementar la venta de comida los fines de semana.
texts.en:
Virginia is 40 years old and has been single since her husband left her to emigrate to another country. Virginia lives with her two daughters. One is married while the other is still in school.

Virginia sells cosmetics. At the weekend she also sells meals. She decided to start doing this work when her husband left her and a neighbour recommended that she try this work in order to help her daughters to get ahead.

Virginia needs this loan in order to buy beauty and styling products. This will allow her to earn a higher income to give her daughter an education and support her family.

Virginia wants to continue selling beauty products and also sell more food at the weekends.

loans.use: to buy beauty and styling products.

loans.name: Chhabiya

texts.en:
Chhabiya is from Maynaguri. She is a young woman who lives in the village of Khagrabari, a remote region in the district of Jalpaiguri. She is 31 years old, married and a mother of four lovely daughters. Three of them are attending school in different grades. One is too young for school.  Chhabiya studied up to grade six, and her husband Sariful, aged 39 years, is illiterate and can only sign his name.

Chhabiya's husband is associated with agricultural activities.  He has been operating this agribusiness for the last 10 years and earns for the family. But the income generated by him is insufficient to cover all the household expenses. So Chhabiya initiated her business of milk sales.  She has an animal husbandry business. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. She also sells animals to generate an extra amount of income.  Now she wants to expand her business by purchasing one more cow for the financial improvement of her family.

She is requesting a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to fulfill her mission. She will buy a dairy cow with this loan. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her.  With the profit, she wants to reach her goal of providing a better education to her children.

She greatly appreciates the financial help of her lenders (BJS and Kiva).

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for her milk-selling business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Wicliff

texts.en:
Wicliff, 47 years old, is married with 10 children living in Kasese, Uganda. Wicliff practices commercial agriculture growing crops such as maize, eggplant and bananas, a business he has operated for 21 years. Wicliff started the business to get a daily source of income in order to earn a living. He is so hard working, however weather changes and thieves are challenges he encounters.

Wicliff is requesting a loan to buy farm inputs like fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs like fertilizers and pay for labor

loans.name: Mesalimu

texts.en:
Mesalimu appreciates her previous loan that improved her living standards. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income.

She would like to apply for a loan to buy more stock of fish for her business. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fish for her business

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina, es soltera y tiene 20 años, nació en la localidad de Minero, ubicado en la Provincia Obispo Santisteban del departamento de Santa Cruz – Bolivia. 

Carolina actualmente vive con sus padres, y estudia la carrera de Administración de Empresas, ella nos comenta que debido a problemas familiares sus padres se han visto afectados económicamente por lo que no cuentan con los recursos necesarios para seguir solventando sus estudios , por esta razón al ser su principal motivación es el de tener una profesión y de esta forma en un futuro ayudar económicamente a sus padres y superarse en lo personal, ella solicito un crédito educativo para poder culminar sus estudios. 

Carolina está convencida que al terminar su carrera logrará insertarse en el mercado laboral como profesional, lo que le ayudara a tener estabilidad económica, su sueño es formar parte importante de una prestigiosa empresa de nuestro país, y seguir estudiando para especializarse de acuerdo al área de trabajo que desarrolle. 

Carolina considera que lo que la diferencia de los demás es su perseverancia para conseguir sus metas, como el de culminar su carrera, pese a los obstáculos que se presenten como en el económico.

Carolina se siente muy agradecida con las personas que ayudan a otros y ya se siente una ganadora con el solo hecho de que le den la oportunidad de poder culminar sus estudios y cumplir uno de sus principales sueños y metas.
texts.en:
Carolina is 20 years old and single. She was born in the town of Minero, in the Obispo Santisteban province of Santa Cruz department, Bolivia.

Carolina currently lives with her parents and is studying for a degree in business administration. She says that, due to family problems, her parents have financial difficulties and so do not have enough money to continue paying for Carolina's studies. Given that her greatest desire in life is to have a profession and in the future to support her parents financially and to do better in life, Carolina has applied for a loan in order to finish her studies.

Carolina is convinced that, on finishing her degree, she will be able to enter the labour market as a professional and that this will give her financial stability. Her dream is to be a part of a large company here in Bolivia, and to continue studying in order to specialise.

Carolina believes that what differentiates her from others is her perseverance in achieving her goals (such as finishing her degree) in spite of the obstacles on her path (such as financial ones).

Carolina is very grateful to those who help others and feels like a winner just knowing that she is being given the opportunity to finish her studies and achieve one of her biggest dreams and aims.

loans.use: to pay for her degree title in business management.

loans.name: Esperanza Elizabeth

texts.es:
Esperanza de 31 años de edad, se caso hace unos 10 años, pero no pudo seguir sus estudios ahorra en dia su esposo la a puesto a estudiar a distancia, ya lleva segundo año de bachillerato a distancia osea que solo los fines de semana estudia. Su esposo se dedica en los tiempos libres a la agricultura, porque la mayoria de tiempo lo trabaja en la alcaldia en el camión de basura, tienen 2 hijos, que aun viven en casa y van a la escuela en casa solo vive su esposo y sus dos hijos pero de ella dependen 2.

Esperanza se dedica a los oficios domesticos, pero tambien tiene un molino desde hace 4 años esto ella lo aprendio de su familia, ya que en su casa donde ella vivia con sus padres tenia molino y ella era la que pasaba trabajando ahi, dice que cuando se caso dijo que no queria pasar solo esperando que su esposo consiguiera algo, ella tambien queria trabajar fue asi como le propuso a su esposo que compraran un molino para que les generara ingresos, ademas invento poner una pequeña tienda todo esto lo tiene en su casa, los horarios de moler son de 8:00 am a 11.30 am y de 3:00 pm a 5:00 pm. Puso horarios asi ya que tambien tiene que hacer los oficios de la casa. 

El hijo mayor le ayuda cuando ella tiene que salir a comprar o hacer alguna diligencia.En este momento el molino necesita una reparacion, ya que el motor del molino se le a dañado y necesita comprar uno nuevo, ella para eso solicita el préstamo y pues dice que tambien quiere invertirle a la tienda, ya que siente que le genera rentabilidad y asi mismo puede ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa. Sus sueños son siempre que Dios le de salud a su familia y que un dia ella pueda tener su tienda surtida de todo para que los clientes se vayan mas satisfechos sin necesidad de que vayan hasta el pueblo vecino a traer lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Esperanza is 31 years old and has been married for 10 years. She was unable to continue with her studies but now her husband has set her up to do distance learning. She is now in the second year of her high school diploma although she only studies at the weekend. Her husband does agriculture in his spare time, because the majority of the time he he works for the local council as a refuse collector. They have 2 children who still live at home and go to primary school. Only her husband and two children live in the house but she has 2 dependents. 

Esperanza looks after the home but for the last 4 years she has also had a mill. She learnt this business from her family, since when she lived at home her parents had a mill and she was the one who worked there. She says that when she got married she did not just want to rely on her husband to get work and she wanted to work herself, so she suggested to her husband buying a mill to generate an income. She also came up with the idea of setting up a small shop. She does all of this in her home. Her hours for milling are from 8am to 11.30am and from 3pm to 5pm. She chose these hours as she also has to do the household chores.

Her older son helps out when she has to go out to buy something or go on an errand. At the moment the mill needs repairing, as the motor got damaged and she needs to buy a new one.

This is why she is asking for the loan and she also says that she wants to invest in the shop as she feels it is making a profit and so she can help her husband with the household expenses.

She hopes that God will always keep her family healthy and hopes one day to be able to stock her shop with everything so that her customers leave more satisfied and don't have to go to the nearby town to get what they need.

loans.use: to buy a motor for the mill and buy sugar, rice, oil, eggs and other items for the shop.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en: Oliver is a 32-year-old married woman with five children. She and her family live in Bundibugyo, Uganda. When she realized that she had saved enough money from selling cocoa, she started a retail shop to manage her daily expenditures. She wishes to have a big cocoa store and supply on a wholesale basis only. Oliver is a hardworking mother who wants a loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase caustic soda, charcoal and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Edson

texts.en: Forty-five-year-old Edson is married with 10 children. He and his family live in Bundibugyo, Uganda. Edson provides for his big family by working very hard to earn a living. For 20 years, he has been growing cocoa to sell, which has enabled him to maintain the family and pay his children's school fees. His plan is to expand his production base by buying more land for cocoa farming. His greatest business challenge is seasonality. He needs a loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: To buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice and cooking seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: María Dominga

texts.es:
María tiene 37 años de edad, estudió bachillerato, por problemas económicos ya no pudo seguir estudiando aunque sus deseos fueron y siguen siendo esos. Está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas y en ocasiones cuando encuentra otro tipo de trabajo lo realiza también. Es madre de 4 hijos entre 1 y 14 años de edad, y todos dependen de María.

María se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas y granos básicos, específicamente a sembrar pipián, cuenta que desde hace 10 años realiza esta actividad, ella cuando se acompañó ya no pudo salir a trabajar por lo tanto pensó trabajar en esta área, antes trabajada en una comercial en la ciudad pero por no dejar solos a sus hijos ya no siguió, el lugar donde cultiva es en el mismo terreno donde está su casa y trabaja de 7:00 a 11:00 AM.


María necesita el crédito para comprar los insumos agrícolas para fertilizar sus cultivos, dentro de estos están 3 quintales de sulfato de amonio, 1 litro de herbicidas para controlar  las malezas y con el resto pagará parte de la mano de obra y algunos gastos en productos alimenticios para su hogar.

Su sueño es que sus hijos se preparen para que en el futuro tengan mejores oportunidades de empleo y puedan valerse por si solos y que tengan una vida diferente a la que ella tuvo en el pasado.
texts.en:
María is 37 years old and studied as far as the high school diploma. For financial reasons she was unable to continue studying although she wanted to and would still like to. She has a partner and he works in agriculture, as well as occasionally doing other kinds of work whenever he finds it. She has 4 children aged between 1 and 14 and they are all dependent on her. 

María makes a living growing vegetables and basic grains. In particular she grows "pipián" [a type of squash]. She says she has been doing this work for 10 years. When she got together with her partner she could no longer go out to work and so she decided to work in agriculture. Previously she worked for a business in the city but she stopped doing this as she did not want to leave her children on their own.

The land which she cultivates is in the same place as her house and she works from 7am to 11am.

María needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies to fertilize the crops. Among these are 3 quintals of ammonium sulphate and a litre of weedkiller to control the weeds. She will use the rest of the money to pay for labour and buy some food items for the household.

Her dream is that her children will have an education so that in the future they will have better employment prospects and be able to fend for themselves. She hopes they will have a different life from the one she has had up until now.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural supplies (3 quintals of ammonium sulphate, 1 litre of weedkiller) to fertilize her crops, to pay for labour and buy food for the household.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beauty products and a printer.

loans.name: Nilma Liseth

texts.es:
Nilma tiene 21 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, actualmente está casada y tienen una hija de 3 años de edad , su esposo vive y trabaja en otro país.


Ella se dedica al cuidado de su hija, y también se dedica al la crianza de cerdos, actividad en la cual tiene dos años de realizar y lo aprendió de sus padres, además tiene el apoyo de su esposo el cual le envía remesas.



El crédito lo necesita para comprar 4 cerdos pequeños, mas dos quintales de concentrado para alimentarlos, y así  poder tener una fuente de ingreso para así  junto a su esposo salir adelante.


Su sueño es darle mejores condiciones de vida a su hija de 3 años, por eso se dedica a la crianza de cerdos.
texts.en:
Nilma is 21 years old and studied as far as sixth grade. She is now married and they have a 3-year-old daughter. Her husband lives and works in another country.

She looks after her daughter and also makes a living raising pigs. She has been doing this for 2 years and learnt the business from her parents. She also gets support from her husband who sends her money. 

She needs the loan to buy 4 small pigs as well as 4 quintals of concentrated feed for them. This will enable her to have a source of income so she and her husband can make progress in life.

Her dream is to improve her 3-year-old daughter's living conditions and this is why she raises pigs.

loans.use: to buy 4 small pigs and 2 quintals of concentrated feed for them.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es: Dominga de 58 años de edad, esta casada, madre de 5 hijos, cuatro hembras y un varón, Dominga y su esposo se dedican a la agricultura, ellos cultivan 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz, actividad que realizan desde muy pequeños, y en la actualidades lo que les brinda el sustento diario. El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar semilla, veneno, abono y para pagar a ayudantes.  El sueño de Dominga es mejorar sus ingresos y a futuro mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dominga, who is 58 years old, is married and has 5 children, four girls and a boy. Dominga and her husband work in agriculture. They grow 10,500 square metres of corn and have been doing this since they were very young. Now it is what provides for their daily needs.

The loan will be used to buy seed, poison and manure and to pay for helpers. 

Dominga's dream is to improve her income and to improve her quality of life in the future.

loans.use: to buy seed, poison and manure and pay for helpers.

loans.name: Moreen

texts.en: Twenty-eight-year-old Moreen has two children and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. When Moreen accumulated some savings from the proceeds of her last loan, she decided to start up a food stall in the market to supplement her cocoa selling. She has improved her daily earnings, which has helped her to sustain her children's welfare. She hopes to buy land for cocoa farming to fetch more profits. Moreen is requesting a loan to buy rice, beans and cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans and cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en: Alex is a thirty-six-year-old married man with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He trades in cocoa and sells it to cocoa agents in the area. He has been in the trade since 2013 and has been able to cater for his welfare using the proceeds. Competition and limited capital affect his business. He wishes to purchase land and build a house. He is requesting a loan to buy more bags of cocoa to sell.

loans.use: To buy more bags of cocoa to sell

loans.name: Shatura

texts.en:
"Shatura is a hard-working woman. Shatura is 23 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe in the Kampala south region of Uganda. She has no children. For the past 3 years, Shatura has been working hard to manage her clothing business, which sells clothes. 

To help expand her business, Shatura has requested a loan of 800,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more clothes, and it will help Shatura to generate greater profits and provide for the family. Shatura hopes that in the future she will be able to build a house and buy a car. 

Shatura is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training."

loans.use: to buy more clothes

loans.name: Jaffery

texts.en: Jaffery is a forty-seven-year-old married man with six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He owns a retail shop, which alongside coffee farming has enabled him to earn a living. He dreams of building a commercial building on his plot although limited capital and competition affect him. He is a hard-working man who wants a loan to buy more merchandise such as sugar, rice and soap to sell.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise such as sugar, rice and soap to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase chicken feed and vitamins for his chickens, also to to make some improvements in the place where he keeps them.

loans.name: Leyla Encarnacio

texts.es: Leyla de 35 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura cultiva yuca y también  siembra maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los alrededor de la zona, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, Leyla está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde desea empezar a realizar la siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Leyla, 35 years old, has worked for a number of years in agriculture, growing yucca and also planting corn and beans. She sells the products around the area; with what she earns from her sales she manages to cover the household expenses. She lives in her own house with her family.  Leyla is asking for a loan to purchase fertilizer, manure, pesticide, etc., and to improve the land where she wants to plant that is shown in the photo, and, in turn, be able to have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, manure, pesticides, etc and to improve the land.

loans.name: Nuru

texts.en:
Nuru is a married woman with five school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food. 

For the past two years, she has operated a food selling business, preparing various foods such as rice, flat bread, beans that she sells to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality as her major challenge. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase wheat flour, rice, beans, cooking oil and charcoal for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, rice, beans, cooking oil and charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Unas enormes montañas acompañadas con un vientecito refrescante y un sol brillante, son los que le brindan los buenos días a Juan Carlos cuando visita sus siembras de arroz para inspeccionar que todo se desarrolle en orden. Tiene 35 años de edad, está en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  Inició en el negocio del cultivo hace nueve años, el cual se ha convertido en su principal fuente económica. Su compañera de vida ha sido su mano derecha, juntos luchan para brindarles a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida.
