This group of 28 women is part of the ’banc villageois’  which was created on October 22, 2013 and which is composed of members living in and around the same village They are motivated by good interrelationships. Their main work involves commerce.

Maguette, who is standing at the right in the photo with a hand raised, is 30 years old and a married mother of three children, including one boy. She is active in selling fabrics, bed sheets, and dresses. It’s a business she has been running since joining the ’banc villageois’.  

With this loan, she is going to purchase 300,000 francs worth of fabrics. She is going to fashion 10 dresses for 6,000 francs each. She plans on selling a dress at 15,000 francs. The profits will be used to care for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es: La Sra. Mercedes tiene 38 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos, los cuales aún dependen de ella. Lleva 12 meses como cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de anticuchos. Ella inicio este negocio por motivación propia, ya que el ingreso que percibía únicamente por su esposo, no le era suficiente para cubrir todos sus gastos y es así que decidió emprender este  pequeño negocio que le ayudó mucho para así poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus menores hijos. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo, Mercedes logra cubrir algunos gastos que tiene en su hogar tales como alimentación, educación, vestimenta y los pagos de servicios de. Su plan familiar para el futuro es que sus hijos sean profesionales de éxito, y el de su negocio es abrir un restaurante en una zona muy comercial. Ella utilizó el préstamo en la compra de mercadería para su negocio. Mercedes pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Nuevo Amanecer”, el cual está conformado por 6 socias y en donde ocupa el cargo de presidenta.Ella se encuentra en la parte del medio con una casaca de color rojo.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 38 years old, married, and has five children who depend on her.  She has been a client of Edaprospo for 12 months and she works selling snacks.  She started this business herself, since her husband's income was not enough to cover all of their expenses, so she decided to start this small business.  It has helped her a lot and allowed her to provide a better quality of life to her young children.  With her effort and work, Mercedes has been able to cover household expenses such as food, education, clothing, and utilities.  In the future, she hopes that her children will be successful professionals and that she can open a restaurant in a busy commercial area.  

She will use this loan to purchase merchandise for her business.

Mercedes is a member of the Nuevo Amanecer community bank, which is made up of six members.  She is the president.  She is in the middle of the picture, wearing a red jacket.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Guillerma Emilia

texts.es: Guillermina: Es una mujer luchadora, tiene 43 años  de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos, adolescentes, no asisten al colegio debido a la distancia del colegio, ya que se encuentra a 90 kilómetros del municipio de Puerto Cabezas.  Desde niña trabaja en la agricultura, tiene una finca de 40 manzanas, en la produce maíz, musáceas, tubérculos, granos básicos, producción de bovinos.  Solicita su primer financiamiento con el objetivo de incrementar el área de producción de plátanos, quequisque y malanga. Su sueño es mejorar la calidad productiva de su finca.
texts.en:
Guillermina is a fighting woman. She is 43 years old, married, and has 4 adolescent children. They don't attend school due to the distance of the school, since it is located 90 kilometres from the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. 

Since she was a child she has worked in agriculture, and she has a farm of 40 manzanas which produces maize, bananas, tubers, grains and houses cattle.  She asks for her first loan with the goal of increasing the area of production of bananas, malanga and taro. Her dream is to improve the productive quality of her farm.

loans.use: to increase the area of production of bananas, malanga, and taro.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is 62 years old and married with six children.  She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines, and has been farming rice for 11 years.  She also earns additional income from food vending. 

Lilia is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Aura Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Aura Mercedes, es madre de 2 pequeños hijos, labora como enfermera en uno de los centros hospitalarios de la Ciudad de León desde hace 5 años, inicia sus labores desde las 08:00 am a 12:00 y de 02:00 pm a 05:00 pm como este mismo horario de lunes a viernes, ella realiza esta labor para llevar el sustento a su hogar y la mantención de sus pequeños.

La señora Aura, solicito este crédito a Ceprodel para la  compra de bloques, hierro, cemento y piedrín para la remodelación de su humilde vivienda, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida junto a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aura Mercedes is the mother of two small children. She has been working as a nurse at one of the hospitals in the city of Leon for five years. She works from  8:00 a.m. to 12:00 pm and from 2:00 pm to 5:00 pm every Monday through Friday. She carries out this work to maintain the household and to raise her little ones.

Aura requests this loan from Ceprodel to buy bricks, iron, cement and gravel to remodel her modest home, allowing her to improve her standard of living and that her children.

loans.use: buy bricks, iron, cement and gravel.

loans.name: Rodah

texts.en:
Rodah is 26 years old and married to Shem.  Together they have been blessed with two children 5 years and 2 years old.  Shem provides additional income for his family.

Rodah has a retail shop where she sells goods like sugar, wheat flour, rice, cooking oil, and other household items, receiving a monthly income of 6,000 KES.

Rodah has requested a loan of 10,000 KES that she will use to purchase bundles of sugar, wheat flour, and cooking oil for her retail business.  With the profits from the loan, Rodah will be able to expand her business and more stably support her family.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, wheat flour, and cooking oil for her retail business.

loans.name: Lornitta

texts.en:
Lornitta is 58 years old, and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family running a general store in the Philippines.  Lornitta requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like sugar, eggs, soap, rice, shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

Lornitta has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF prior to this loan.  She has been running the general store for 4 years and also earns income from food vending.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like sugar, eggs, soap, rice, shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Unidas Para El Exito Group

texts.es: La Sra. Luisa de 38 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos los cuales aún dependen de ella. Lleva 3 años como cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir, negocio que se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Comenzó con la idea de este negocio gracias a un familiar que también realizaba confecciones, a quien apoyo durante un tiempo y pudo aprender de este negocio; es así que decidio emprender este negocio comenzando poco a poco, y ahora cuenta con varias máquinas y personal a su cargo. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo, Luisa ha logrado dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Ella cubre algunos gastos de su hogar como vestimenta y servicios, mientras que su pareja le ayuda con los gastos de alimentación y educación para sus hijos. Su plan para el futuro es hacer que su negocio crezca, terminar de construir su casa y que sus hijos estudien una carrera universitaria. Ella utilizó el préstamo en la compra de tela e hilos para su negocio. Luisa pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Unidas para el exito”, el cual está conformado por 6 personas y lleva el cargo de presidenta. La Sra. Luisa es la persona que se encuentra de pie con una polera de color azul.
texts.en:
Mrs. Luisa, who is 38 years old, is part of a domestic partnership and has two children, both of who still depend on her. She has been an Edaprospo client for the past 3 years and she makes a living fabricating clothing articles, a business she runs from her own home. She began with the idea for this business thanks to a family member who also fabricated clothes, she supported them for some time and was able to learn the trade. She then decided to begin her own business bit by bit and now has several machines and personnel working for her. 
Through her effort and hard work, Luisa has been able to give her family a better quality of life. She covers some of her home's expenses such as clothes and services, while her partner helps with nutrition and education expenses for her children. 
Her plan for the future is to grow her business, finish construction on her house and for her children to attend university and pursue a career. 
She used the loan in the purchase of fabric and thread for her business. Luisa belongs to the communal bank "Unidas Para El Exito," which is composed of 6 people, and she is the president. Mrs. Luisa is the person standing and wearing the blue sweater.

loans.use: purchase fabrics and threads.

loans.name: Rosa Emelina

texts.es:
La joven Rosa Emelina, labora como comerciante en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de León, desempeñando esta labor desde hace 3 años, inicia sus labores a las 06:30 am y finalizándolas a las 12:30 pm con este mismo horario de lunes a domingo posterior se traslada a su casa de habitación para la continuar con dicha labor, ella  realiza esta labor para la mantención de su hogar y de su mamá.   

La joven Rosa,  solicito un crédito a Ceprodel el que  utilizo para compra de gaseosas de distintos tamaños como de sabores al por mayor, lo cual le aumentar su capital de trabajo y sus ganancias brindándole un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: The young Rosa Emelina works as a retailer in a small market in the city of León. She has been performing this work for the past 3 years. She begins her duties at 6:30 am and finishes at 12:30 pm working this same schedule from Monday to Sunday, going home, and beginning again with her work. She performs this job to maintain her home and provide for her mother. The young Rosa requested a credit from Ceprodel which she used to purchase soda of different sizes and flavors at wholesale which increases her working capital and her earnings providing her a better level of life.

loans.use: purchase soda at wholesale.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
La señor Ramiro, labora como ingeniero Electrónico en unas de las empresas privadas de la ciudad de León, se dedica a esta desde hace 4 años, inicia sus labores en turnos variados de 07:00 am y finalizándolas a las 05:00 pm lunes a viernes en este mismo horario, el realiza esta labor para la mantención de su hogar.

Don Ramiro,  se acercó a Ceprodel a solicitar un crédito el que utilizo  para la compra de láminas de zinc, las cuales serán implementadas en la remodelación y mejora del techo de su humilde vivienda ya que estamos en el período de invierno permitiéndole mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mr. Ramiro works as an electronic engineer at one of the private companies in the city of Leon, he has been doing this for the past 4 years. He performs his duties during varied shifts beginning at 7:00 am and finishing at 5:00 pm, Monday through Friday. He performs this job in order to maintain his home.
Mr. Ramiro approached Ceprodel to request a credit for the purchase of corrugated zinc plates which will be implemented in the remodeling and improvement of his humble dwelling. Due to the fact that the winter season is upon him, this will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: purchase corrugated zinc plates.

loans.name: Lucel

texts.en:
Lucel is 31 years old and married.  She works hard to provide for her family by running a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a 30,000  PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like coffee, cream, canned goods, chips, and bread.

Lucel has borrowed and repaid 17 loans from NWTF prior to this loan.  She has been running her general store for 4 years and also earns an income from buying and selling fish.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like coffee, cream, canned goods, chips, and bread.

loans.name: Sopheak

texts.en:
Sopheak, aged 24, is a single man who was born in the Takeo Province of Cambodia.  For further education, Sopheak decided to move to the city to pursue his bachelors degree in the field of Business Admiration.  Currently, he is a freshman at a private university in Phnom Penh City and he dreams of becoming a business man in the future.

Sopheak is now running out of money to pay for his university fees and school materials.  To make his dream come true, he is applying for a loan from KIVA to pay for his tuition fees.  Sopheak is very happy and grateful for the loan funded via a program like Kiva that enables poor students to pursue a higher level of education as well as help contribute to the future development of Cambodia.

This loan will be disbursed over a period of several years, paid directly to the educational institution at the time of enrolment, for fees for each academic year.  Accordingly, there is the possibility of a small variation in loan amount and repayment terms, based on shifting class availability and prices.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Marcelina works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling vegetables business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish. Marcelina is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy varieties of vegetables to sell for her vegetable business.

Marcelina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy varieties of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Maria Lilian

texts.en:
As a married parent with children, Maria Lilian works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish and raising livestock. Maria Lilian is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like vegetables, spices, fish, etc. for her restaurant business.

Maria Lilian has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like vegetables, spices, fish, etc.
